actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to treat the residence of a State legislator within the legislative district he represents as his home for tax purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to restrict the amount of the deduction State legislators may take for living expenses while conducting legislative business to the daily dollar limitation to be established by the Secretary of the Treasury for each state legislature.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to treat the residence of a State legislator within the legislative district he represents as his home for tax purposes.
